name: Flax Garlic Onion Flatbread
ingredients: Cooking spray or additional butter for greasing

instructions.en: In a small bowl, combine the flax meal, baking powder, onion powder, garlic powder, and a pinch of salt.
instructions.sk: V malej miske zmiešajte ľanové semienka, prášok do pečiva, cibuľový prášok, cesnakový prášok a štipku soli.
instructions.ja: 小さなボウルにフラックスミール、ベーキングパウダー、オニオンパウダー、ガーリックパウダー、少量の塩を入れて混ぜます。

instructions.en: In another small microwave-safe bowl, melt the butter in the microwave.
instructions.sk: V druhej malej miske vhodnej do mikrovlnnej rúry roztopte maslo.
instructions.ja: 別の電子レンジ対応の小さなボウルにバターを入れ、電子レンジで溶かします。

instructions.en: Add the egg and water to the melted butter; beat with a fork until well blended.
instructions.sk: K roztopenému maslu pridajte vajce a vodu; vyšľahajte vidličkou, kým sa dobre nespoja.
instructions.ja: 溶かしたバターに卵と水を加え、フォークでよく混ぜます。

instructions.en: Add the dry ingredients to the wet ingredients and beat well with the fork.
instructions.sk: Pridajte suché prísady k mokrým a dobre vyšľahajte vidličkou.
instructions.ja: 乾燥材料を湿った材料に加え、フォークでよく混ぜます。

instructions.en: Grease a 9 or 10 inch glass pie plate. Pour the batter into the plate and spread to cover the bottom.
instructions.sk: Vymastite 23-25 cm sklenenú formu na koláč. Nalejte do nej cesto a rozotrite ho tak, aby pokrylo dno.
instructions.ja: 9〜10インチ（約23〜25cm）のガラスパイ皿に油を塗ります。生地を注ぎ、底面全体に広げます。

instructions.en: Microwave on HIGH for 1 1/2 to 3 minutes, until cooked through but still pliable.
instructions.sk: Varte v mikrovlnnej rúre na vysokom výkone 1,5 až 3 minúty, kým nie je prepečené, ale stále ohybné.
instructions.ja: 電子レンジの高温で1分30秒から3分間、中まで火が通るまで加熱しますが、まだ柔軟性がある状態にします。

instructions.en: Use like a pita, wrap or tortilla. Reheat briefly in the microwave if it becomes too stiff.
instructions.sk: Použite ako pita chlieb, wrap alebo tortillu. Ak stuhne, krátko ohrejte v mikrovlnnej rúre.
instructions.ja: ピタパン、ラップ、またはトルティーヤのように使用します。固くなりすぎた場合は、電子レンジで短時間再加熱してください。

notes: This Flax Garlic Onion Flatbread is a quick, microwave-friendly keto alternative to traditional flatbreads. It's high in fiber from the flax meal and low in carbs, making it suitable for a ketogenic diet. The flatbread is versatile and can be used as a wrap, tortilla, or pita substitute. For best results, use golden flax meal if available, as it has a milder flavor than brown flax meal.
